page.title: 01 Description of Cwmbran
page.content:
Our square is the South Eastern section of Cwmbran, the first new town in Wales, which has grown steadily since 1947. In large housing estates to the North of our square are robust communities living in a wide range of houses set amid large green play areas. New houses are being built to accomodate the increasing population in the West, on the Hollybush Estate. The Ty-Coch Estate and the new Llantarnam Industrial Park offer a wide range of facilities, from the neighbourhood style units for the smaller businesses, to a hi-tech show factory. The South and West are still mainly rural, parklands to the West and farms to the South. Industry and housing are however continually diminishing this.
Written by{Class 6 (Oakfield)
